title: Managing Your Money - Can Bitcoin Bounce Back?
description: Cryptocurrencies face a rocky road to recovery. Join Daren Fonda, crypto and finance editor at Barron's, and Marion Laboure, macro strategist at Deutsche Bank, to discuss what's next for Bitcoin and crypto overall in a tougher investing climate.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Cryptocurrencies face a rocky road to recovery. Join Daren Fonda, crypto and finance editor at Barron's, and Marion Laboure, macro strategist at Deutsche Bank, to discuss what's next for Bitcoin and crypto overall in a tougher investing climate.
